mapper.select: SELECT * FROM op_order oo WHERE oo.`status` = 1 AND oo.orderno = #{orderno}

SELECT ll.* FROM `le_leasescompany` ll WHERE ll.tocstate = 2 and ((ll.status = 1 and ll.platformtype = 1) or (ll.status = 2 and ll.platformtype = 0)) ORDER BY ll.platformtype, CONVERT (shortname USING gbk) ASC;
select id, text shortName from pub_dictionary where type = '租赁公司' and status = '1' order by CONVERT (shortname USING gbk) ASC

select op_order.orderno, op_order.ordertype, op_order.plateno, op_order.factmodelname cartype, concat(op_order.vehcbrandname, " ", op_order.vehclinename) carbrand, pub_driver.name drivername, pub_driver.phone driverphone from op_order left join pub_driver on op_order.driverid = pub_driver.id where op_order.orderno = #{orderno}

SELECT oa.startprice, oa.rangeprice, oa.timeprice, ov.* FROM op_vehiclemodels ov, op_accountrules oa WHERE 1 = 1 AND oa.`status` = 1 AND ov.`status` = 1 AND oa.vehiclemodelsid = ov.Id AND oa.rulesstate = 0 AND oa.rulestype = #{ordertype} AND oa.city = #{city} and ov.modelstatus = "0" ORDER BY ov.`level`

SELECT COUNT(aa.id) from (SELECT fav.*,CONCAT(fav.name,fav.phone) namephone FROM( ( SELECT pu.id, pu.id userid, pu.nickname `name`, pu.account phone, pu.createtime, pu.updatetime, pu.id creater, pu.id updater, pu.`Status` FROM pe_user pu WHERE 1=1 AND pu.`status` = 1 AND pu.id = #{userid} ) UNION ( SELECT pm.* FROM pub_mostcontact pm, pe_user pu WHERE 1=1 AND pu.`status` = 1 AND pm.`status` = 1 AND pm.userphone = pu.account AND pm.phone != pu.account AND pu.id = #{userid} ) ) fav
WHERE (fav.phone LIKE '%${sSearch}%' OR fav.name LIKE '%${sSearch}%')
GROUP BY CONCAT(fav.name,fav.phone))aa

SELECT
fav.name id, CONCAT(fav.phone, ' ',IFNULL(fav.name,'')) text
fav.phone id, CONCAT(fav.phone, ' ',IFNULL(fav.name,'')) text
FROM ( SELECT pu.id, pu.id userid, pu.nickname `name`, pu.account phone, pu.createtime, pu.updatetime, pu.id creater, pu.id updater, pu.`Status` FROM pe_user pu WHERE pu.account = (select account from pe_user where id = #{userid}) and pu.`status` = 1 UNION SELECT pm.* FROM pub_mostcontact pm, pe_user pu WHERE pm.`status` = 1 AND pm.userphone = pu.account AND pu.account = (select account from pe_user where id = #{userid}) ) fav
WHERE (fav.phone LIKE '%${sSearch}%' OR fav.name LIKE '%${sSearch}%') group by CONCAT(fav.phone, ' ',IFNULL(fav.name,'')) LIMIT ${iDisplayStart},${iDisplayLength}

SELECT pu.id, CASE WHEN ( ( SELECT COUNT(oo.orderno) FROM op_order oo WHERE oo.`status` = 1 AND oo.userid = pu.id AND oo.orderstatus = #{orderstatus} AND ( oo.paymentstatus = #{paymentstatus} OR ISNULL(oo.paymentstatus) ) ) + (select count(*) from op_taxiorder where op_taxiorder.status = 1 and op_taxiorder.userid = pu.id and op_taxiorder.orderstatus = "7" and (op_taxiorder.paymentstatus in ("0", "5", "6") or isnull(op_taxiorder.paymentstatus))) ) > 0 THEN CONCAT(pu.account,' ',IFNULL(pu.nickname,''),'(未支付)') WHEN pu.disablestate = 1 THEN CONCAT(pu.account,' ',IFNULL(pu.nickname,''),'(已禁用)') ELSE CONCAT(pu.account,' ',IFNULL(pu.nickname,'')) END text FROM pe_user pu WHERE 1=1 AND pu.`status` = 1
AND ( pu.account LIKE '%${sSearch}%' OR pu.nickname LIKE '%${sSearch}%' )
limit 0,10

SELECT pu.*, ( SELECT COUNT(oo.orderno) FROM op_order oo WHERE oo.`status` = 1 AND oo.userid = pu.id AND oo.orderstatus != 8 AND ( oo.paymentstatus = '0' OR ISNULL(oo.paymentstatus) ) ) > 0 notpay FROM pe_user pu WHERE 1=1 AND pu.`status` = 1 AND pu.id = #{userid}

select concat(id, '_', vehicleid) id, concat(phone, ' ', `name`) text, jobNum, `name`, phone, workStatus, plateNo, vehicleModelName from ( -- toc 业务 select t5.id, t1.id vehicleid, t5.jobnum jobNum, t5.`name`, t5.phone, t5.workstatus workStatus, concat(dicp.`text`, dicc.`text`, t1.plateno) plateNo, t6.name vehicleModelName, t5.belongleasecompany from pub_vehicle t1 inner join op_vehiclemodels_vehicle_ref t2 on t1.id =t2.vehicleid inner join le_leasescompany t3 on t3.id=t1.leasescompanyid inner join pub_driver_vehicle_ref t4 on t4.vehicleid=t1.id inner join pub_driver t5 on t4.driverid = t5.id inner join op_vehiclemodels t6 on t6.Id=t2.vehiclemodelsid inner join pub_dictionary dicp on t1.platenoprovince=dicp.value inner join pub_dictionary dicc on t1.platenocity=dicc.value where 1=1 and t1.status=1 and t2.status=1 and t3.status=1 and t4.status=1 and t5.status=1 and t6.status=1 and t3.tocstate = 2 and t5.vehicletype=0 and t5.workstatus=0 union -- 运管业务 select t1.id, t3.id vehicleid, t1.jobnum jobNum, t1.`name`, t1.phone, t1.workstatus workStatus, concat(dicp.`text`, dicc.`text`, t3.plateno) plateNo, t5.name vehicleModelName, t1.belongleasecompany from pub_driver t1 inner join pub_driver_vehicle_ref t2 on t2.driverid = t1.id inner join pub_vehicle t3 on t3.id = t2.vehicleid inner join op_vehcline_models_ref t4 on t4.vehclineid=t3.vehclineid inner join op_vehiclemodels t5 on t5.Id=t4.vehiclemodelsid inner join pub_dictionary dicp on t3.platenoprovince=dicp.value inner join pub_dictionary dicc on t3.platenocity=dicc.value where 1=1 and dicp.status=1 and dicc.status=1 and t1.status=1 and t2.status=1 and t3.status=1 and t4.status=1 and t5.status=1 and t1.platformtype=0 and t1.vehicletype=0 and t1.workstatus=0 ) t where 1=1
and instr(t.phone, #{phone}) > 0
and instr(t.jobnum, #{jobNum}) > 0
and instr(t.`name`, #{name}) > 0
and (instr(t.`name`, #{keyword}) > 0 or instr(t.phone, #{keyword}) > 0)
and instr(t.plateNo, #{plateNo}) > 0
and t.belongleasecompany = #{leaseCompanyId}

select concat(id, '_', vehicleid) id, concat(phone, ' ', `name`) text, jobNum, `name`, phone, workStatus, plateNo from ( -- 租赁端 select t5.id, t1.id vehicleid, t5.jobnum jobNum, t5.`name`, t5.phone, t5.workstatus workStatus, concat(dicp.`text`, dicc.`text`, t1.plateno) plateNo, t5.belongleasecompany from pub_vehicle t1 inner join le_leasescompany t3 on t3.id=t1.leasescompanyid inner join pub_driver_vehicle_ref t4 on t4.vehicleid=t1.id inner join pub_driver t5 on t4.driverid = t5.id inner join pub_dictionary dicp on t1.platenoprovince=dicp.value inner join pub_dictionary dicc on t1.platenocity=dicc.value where 1=1 and t1.status=1 and t3.status=1 and t4.status=1 and t5.status=1 and t3.tocstate=2 and t5.vehicletype=1 and t1.platformtype = 1 and t1.boundstate = 1 and t5.workstatus=0
-- 运管端 union
select t1.id, t3.id vehicleid, t1.jobnum jobNum, t1.`name`, t1.phone, t1.workstatus workStatus, concat(dicp.`text`, dicc.`text`, t3.plateno) plateNo, t1.belongleasecompany from pub_driver t1 inner join pub_driver_vehicle_ref t2 on t2.driverid = t1.id inner join pub_vehicle t3 on t3.id = t2.vehicleid inner join pub_dictionary dicp on t3.platenoprovince=dicp.value inner join pub_dictionary dicc on t3.platenocity=dicc.value where 1=1 and dicp.status=1 and dicc.status=1 and t1.status=1 and t2.status=1 and t3.status=1 and t1.platformtype=0 and t1.vehicletype=1 and t1.boundstate = 1 and t1.workstatus=0 ) t where 1=1
and instr(t.phone, #{phone}) > 0
and instr(t.jobnum, #{jobNum}) > 0
and instr(t.`name`, #{name}) > 0
and (instr(t.`name`, #{keyword}) > 0 or instr(t.phone, #{keyword}) > 0)
and instr(t.plateNo, #{plateNo}) > 0
and t.belongleasecompany = #{leaseCompanyId}
